DOC.brief_title: Trial On Trabectedin In The Treatment Of Advanced Uterine And Ovarian Carcinosarcoma ( CS ) _MITO 26
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase II , multi-centre , single arm study aim evaluate efficacy toxicity Trabectedin population advance recurrent ovarian uterine carcinosarcoma . Trabectedin infuse dose 1.3 mg/m2 3- hour iv infusion every 3 week via central venous catheter .
